title: Two cops attacked while serving arrest warrant
body: Two members of Bandar police station were injured after being attacked while attempting to execute an arrest warrant in Barishal Wednesday night. Police said that assistant sub-inspector Delwar Hossain and constable Abdus Salam went to the Sonali Pol area of Chandpura Union to arrest Pratap Ghosh, who had an outstanding warrant for failing to appear in court as a witness. ASI Delwar said that Pratap, along with his wife and sons Milan and Basudeb, argued with the officers and then assaulted them, accusing them of extortion and trying to detain them. Later, additional police reached the scene and rescued the injured officers, who were admitted to Sher-e-Bangla Medical College Hospital. Bandar police station officer-in-charge Ismail Hossain said a case will be filed and efforts are underway to arrest the attackers.
